DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy GS-9857 plus sofosbuvir ( SOF ) /velpatasvir ( VEL ) fix dose combination ( FDC ) adults chronic non genotype 1 hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) infection .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy GS-9857 Plus Sofosbuvir/Velpatasvir Fixed Dose Combination Adults With Chronic Non-Genotype 1 HCV Infection
